Package fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs

    Class Description
    DynamicCVM
    The class DynamicCVM creates a component assembly for the single-JVM execution of the dynamic connection example.
    DynamicDistributedCVM
    The class DynamicDistributedDynamicCVM creates a component assembly for the multiple-JVM execution of the dynamic connection example.

Package fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs Description

Dynamic client/server example

This example is meant to learn how to create and execute assembly at run-time, rather than using the static method of the assembly class to create, interconnect and start the components.

The example proposes a dynamic client/server version of the basic one that is obtained by using the dynamic component creation service of the basic component model. This service allows for the remote creation of a component at run-time. Hence, all of the deployment can be made at run-time: creation, start and connection and execution of the components. A new component, called DynamicAssembler, implements the creation, the interconnection and the execution of the components. Hence, the static assembly has just to create and start this component to create the assembly at run-time and then meke the other components run the application.
